text:
Created attachment 34223
the file contains test code and example file.

if you don't understand ,please read the Chinese version
when the word file contains a table with 2 rows, one of which is the 7 columns, the other row is the 4 columns, it will go wrong.
error file and test code has been packaged to the attachment.
multiple versions of the POI have this problem.


当word中包含一个1行7列,1行4列的共2行的表格时,就会存在这种状况.
错误文件与测试代码已经打包到附件.
多个版本的POI都有这个问题.
creator: 610667248@qq.com
